name: Jarvan III
description: Ancien Roi de Demacia, père de Jarvan IV. Son règne fut un modèle de vertu, mais il fut assassiné, un événement qui déstabilisa le royaume et précipita la crise des mages.
description_en: Former King of Demacia, and father of Jarvan IV. His reign was a model of virtue, but he was assassinated, an event that destabilized the kingdom and precipitated the mages crisis.
